DESCENDANTS OF JOHN SHERWOOD

data.text:
DESCENDANTS OF JOHN SHERWOOD

GENERATION NO. 1

1.JOHN1 SHERWOOD WAS BORN ABT. 1790, AND DIED ABT. 1835 IN LOUISIANA.HE MARRIED LUCY DAVIS JANUARY 09, 1817 IN LIBERTY, AMITE CO, MS, DAUGHTER OF JOHN DAVIS AND MARY RATCLIFFE.SHE WAS BORN 1798 IN TYRRELL CO, NORTH CAROLINA, AND DIED 1863 IN RINGGOLD, BIENVILLE PA, LA.

CHILDREN OF JOHN SHERWOOD AND LUCY DAVIS ARE:

2. I. SAMUEL H.2 SHERWOOD, B. NOVEMBER 18, 1817, LIBERTY, AMITE CO, MS; D. JANUARY 12, 1858, RINGGOLD, BIENVILLE PA, LA.

II. MATTIE E. SHERWOOD1,1, B. 1819, LIBERTY, AMITE CO, MS1,1; D. WFT EST. 1854-1914, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1; M. W. S. WATSON1,1, SEPTEMBER 12, 1849, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1; B. WFT EST. 1800-1829, UNKNOWN1,1; D. WFT EST. 1854-1914, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1.

3. III. ISSAC D. SHERWOOD, B. 1820, LIBERTY, AMITE CO, MS; D. JANUARY 10, 1867, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA.

GENERATION NO. 2

2.SAMUEL H.2 SHERWOOD (JOHN1) WAS BORN NOVEMBER 18, 1817 IN LIBERTY, AMITE CO, MS, AND DIED JANUARY 12, 1858 IN RINGGOLD, BIENVILLE PA, LA.HE MARRIED LEAH S. BAILEY WFT EST. 1836-1854 IN LA.

NOTES FOR SAMUEL H. SHERWOOD:

1850 CENSUS SHOWED EDWIN JOSEPH SHERWOOD (AGE 33) LIVING IN HOUSEHOLD, BORN IN VA, COULD BE BROTHER TO SAMUEL.EDWIN MARRIED ANN SMITH 6 JUNE 1850, BIENVILLE PARISH, LA.1850 CENSUS SHOWS S.H. SHERWOOD, WIFE AND 4 CHILDREN RESIDING IN BIENVILLE PARISH, LA.BIRTH PLACE SHOWN AS MISSISSIPPI.'SOME OBITUARIES TAKEN FROM THE INDEPENDENT NEWSPAPER OF HARRISONBURG, LA' DIED SAMUEL H. SHERWOOD AT RINGGOLD 12 JANUARY 1858 - AGE 40 YEARS, ONE MONTH, 24 DAYS - LEFT WIDOW AND SIX CHILDREN - BORN AMITE CO, 18 NOVEMBER 1817

CHILDREN OF SAMUEL SHERWOOD AND LEAH BAILEY ARE:

I. SALENAH L.3 SHERWOOD, B. 1840.

NOTES FOR SALENAH L. SHERWOOD:

1850 CENSUS SHOWS AGE 11.1880 CHEROKEE COUNTY TEXAS CENSUS SHOWS AGE 40 LIVING WITH KING D SHERWOOD AND FAMILY.CORRESPONDENCE FROM ZOLA HARDY SHOWS BEING BORN IN 1839.

II. L.A. SHERWOOD, B. 1841.

MORE ABOUT L.A. SHERWOOD:

FACT 1 (2): 1850 CENSUS SHOWS AGE 9

4. III. KING D. SHERWOOD, B. 1843; D. NOVEMBER 06, 1881, HILLSBORO, TX.

IV. A.D. SHERWOOD, B. 1849.

MORE ABOUT A.D. SHERWOOD:

FACT 1 (2): 1850 CENSUS SHOWS AGE 1

3.ISSAC D.2 SHERWOOD (JOHN1)1,1 WAS BORN 1820 IN LIBERTY, AMITE CO, MS1,1, AND DIED JANUARY 10, 1867 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1.HE MARRIED ANGELINA J. ROWDEN1,1 1839 IN LOUISIANA1.SHE WAS BORN 1821 IN GEORGIA1,1, AND DIED JANUARY 16, 1908 IN MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1.

CHILDREN OF ISSAC SHERWOOD AND ANGELINA ROWDEN ARE:

5. I. WILLIAM HARRISON3 SHERWOOD, B. OCTOBER 14, 1840, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA; D. JUNE 28, 1920, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA.

II. HENRY CLAY SHERWOOD1,1, B. 1845, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1; D. 1863, CIVIL WAR (LEFTON SIDE OF ROAD) LA1,1.

6. III. NETTIE E. SHERWOOD, B. APRIL 06, 1848, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA; D. APRIL 27, 1893, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA.

7. IV. FRANCES E. SHERWOOD, B. JUNE 11, 1852, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA; D. JULY 06, 1930, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA.

8. V. LUCY EVALINE SHERWOOD, B. 1855, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA; D. 1917, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA.

9. VI. HENRI E. SHERWOOD, B. FEBRUARY 16, 1862, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA; D. AUGUST 25, 1896, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA.

GENERATION NO. 3

4.KING D.3 SHERWOOD (SAMUEL H.2, JOHN1) WAS BORN 1843, AND DIED NOVEMBER 06, 1881 IN HILLSBORO, TX.HE MARRIED LYDIA ISADORA BRIAN FEBRUARY 16, 1871, DAUGHTER OF FRANCIS BRIAN AND HANNAH ROGILLIO.SHE WAS BORN DECEMBER 28, 1842 IN EAST FELICIANA PARISH, LA, AND DIED JULY 23, 1907 IN VERDA, LA, BURIED IN NEW JERSULEM CEMETERY, WINNFIELD, LA.

NOTES FOR KING D. SHERWOOD:

CIVIL WAR VETERAN, MEMBER OF 28TH LA INF, CO K.WAS A MASON AND JEWELRY MAKER.1880 CENSUS SOUNDEX OF CHEROKEE COUNTY, TEXAS SHOWS K. D. SHERWOOD, AGE 35 AND LYDIASHERWOOD, AGE 37.1850 CENSUS OF BIENVILLE PARISH SHOWS D(?).D. SHERWOOD, AGE 6.

NOTES FOR LYDIA ISADORA BRIAN:

SEE OBITUARY NOTICE IN SCRAPBOOK.KNOWN AS LYDIA MEREDITH ON MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE AND CENSUS.DIED AT THE HOME OF HER DAUGHTER ADDIE ANDERS, VERDA, LA.JOINED BAPTIST CHURCH AT AGE 11

CHILDREN OF KING SHERWOOD AND LYDIA BRIAN ARE:

I. VERNONA4 SHERWOOD, B. 1873, TEXAS; M. W.L. DICKERSON.

NOTES FOR W.L. DICKERSON:

POSSIBLY OF GEORGETOWN, LA.WORLD FAMILY TREE MARRIAGE INDEX:LA, 1718-1925. WINN PARISH RECORDS SHOW VERONA SHERWOOD MARRYING WILLIAM L. DICKERSON ON JANUARY 2, 1890.

10. II. WILLIAM D. SHERWOOD, B. JANUARY 06, 1874; D. APRIL 13, 1946.

III. SAMUEL FRANCIS SHERWOOD, B. SEPTEMBER 18, 1876; D. NOVEMBER 26, 1944, NEW JERUSALEM CEMETERY, WINN PARISH.

NOTES FOR SAMUEL FRANCIS SHERWOOD:

POSSIBLY OF ALANZO, LA.SEE VOLUME 8, WORLD FAMILY TREE.

IV. CATHRON SHERWOOD, B. 1877, TEXAS; M. J.F. DICKERSON, DECEMBER 31, 1896, WINN PARISH, LA.

NOTES FOR CATHRON SHERWOOD:

1880 CENSUS, TEXAS, CHEROKEE COUNTY SHOWS RACHEL AS 2 MONTHS OLD.

NOTES FOR J.F. DICKERSON:

POSSIBLY OF ALONZO, LA.FAMILY TREE MARRIAGE INDEX:LA, 1718-1925, WINN PARISH, LA RECORDS SHOWS KATIE SHERWOOD MARRYING JAMES F. DICKERSON.

V. RACHEL ADDIE SHERWOOD, B. BET. 1879 - 1880; M. E.M. ANDERS.

5.WILLIAM HARRISON3 SHERWOOD (ISSAC D.2, JOHN1)1,1 WAS BORN OCTOBER 14, 1840 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1, AND DIED JUNE 28, 1920 IN MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1.HE MARRIED MARTHA MATILDA CHILDRE1,1 ABT. 1870 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1, DAUGHTER OF BENJAMIN CHILDRE AND LAVINIA TATUM.SHE WAS BORN FEBRUARY 22, 1849 IN MONTGOMERY CO, AL1,1, AND DIED DECEMBER 23, 1923 IN MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1.

CHILDREN OF WILLIAM SHERWOOD AND MARTHA CHILDRE ARE:

11. I. ELLA FRANCES4 SHERWOOD, B. DECEMBER 18, 1871, HARRRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA; D. APRIL 20, 1951, SHREVEPORT, CADDO PARISH, LA.

12. II. THOMAS BENJAMIN SHERWOOD, B. MARCH 12, 1875, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA; D. MAY 20, 1958, CONVERSE, SABINE PARISH LA.

III. ROBERT LEE SHERWOOD1,1, B. JANUARY 15, 1877, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1; D. FEBRUARY 18, 1951, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1; M. BETTIE PATRICK1,1, JUNE 22, 1899, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1; B. APRIL 09, 1878, FARMERSVILLE, UNION PARISH, LOUISIANA1,1; D. MARCH 04, 1936, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1.

13. IV. LAURA J. SHERWOOD, B. NOVEMBER 18, 1878, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA; D. MAY 13, 1947, CONVERSE, SABINE PARISH LA.

14. V. MARTHA MATILDA SHERWOOD, B. DECEMBER 31, 1878, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA; D. FEBRUARY 22, 1969, CONVERSE, SABINE PARISH LA.

15. VI. WILLIAM HARRISON (FILS) SHERWOOD, B. APRIL 20, 1880, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA; D. OCTOBER 05, 1944, CONVERSE, SABINE PARISH LA.

16. VII. HATTIE M. SHERWOOD, B. MARCH 03, 1881, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA; D. 1963, PORT ARTHUR, JEFFERSON CO., TEXAS.

17. VIII. SARAH LAVINIA SHERWOOD, B. MARCH 10, 1882, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA; D. JUNE 08, 1960, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA.

18. IX. TOLLIE ROWDEN SHERWOOD, B. NOVEMBER 26, 1885, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA; D. OCTOBER 15, 1960, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA.

19. X. LUTHER HENRY SHERWOOD, B. MARCH 26, 1888, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA; D. APRIL 13, 1966, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA.

6.NETTIE E.3 SHERWOOD (ISSAC D.2, JOHN1)1,1 WAS BORN APRIL 06, 1848 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1, AND DIED APRIL 27, 1893 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1.SHE MARRIED W. L. WATSON1,1 SEPTEMBER 22, 1867 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1.HE WAS BORN OCTOBER 08, 1833 IN UNKNOWN1,1, AND DIED JANUARY 15, 1881 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1.

CHILD OF NETTIE SHERWOOD AND W. WATSON IS:

20. I. WILSON4 WATSON, B. ABT. 1869, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA; D. WFT EST. 1890-1959, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA.

7.FRANCES E.3 SHERWOOD (ISSAC D.2, JOHN1)1,1 WAS BORN JUNE 11, 1852 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1, AND DIED JULY 06, 1930 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1.SHE MARRIED JAMES M. FAULK1,1 MARCH 24, 1870 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1.HE WAS BORN WFT EST. 1826-1855 IN ALABAMA1,1, AND DIED JULY 15, 1881 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1.

CHILDREN OF FRANCES SHERWOOD AND JAMES FAULK ARE:

I. LUCIOUS ELAM4 FAULK1,1, B. JULY 12, 1879, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1; D. SEPTEMBER 26, 1946, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1; M. JANIE LEE1,1, WFT EST. 1900-1928, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1; B. AUGUST 26, 1887, UNKNOWN1,1; D. SEPTEMBER 17, 1948, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1.

II. JAMES M. (FILS) FAULK1,1, B. WFT EST. 1870-18821,1; D. WFT EST. 1874-19681,1.

III. MARY ELLA FAULK1,1, B. WFT EST. 1870-18821,1; D. WFT EST. 1874-19711,1.

IV. JAMES MADISON FAULK1,1, B. WFT EST. 1870-18821,1; D. WFT EST. 1874-19681,1.

V. LODDIA FAULK1,1, B. WFT EST. 1870-18821,1; D. WFT EST. 1874-19711,1.

8.LUCY EVALINE3 SHERWOOD (ISSAC D.2, JOHN1)1,1 WAS BORN 1855 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1, AND DIED 1917 IN MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1.SHE MARRIED JOHN B. FULLER1,1 MAY 27, 1871 IN FARMERSVILLE, UNION PARISH, LOUISIANA1.HE WAS BORN NOVEMBER 22, 1851 IN SHILOH, UNION PARISH, LA1,1, AND DIED 1934 IN MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1.

CHILDREN OF LUCY SHERWOOD AND JOHN FULLER ARE:

I. ERNEST T.4 FULLER1,1, B. JUNE 20, 1873, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1; D. JUNE 30, 1910, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1.

II. ALICE A. FULLER1,1, B. 1875, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1; D. WFT EST. 1901-1969, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1; M. R. S. HEARD1,1, NOVEMBER 24, 1895, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1; B. WFT EST. 1850-1876, LA1,1; D. WFT EST. 1900-1963, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1.

III. JOHN B(FILS) FULLER1,1, B. NOVEMBER 02, 1879, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1; D. NOVEMBER 02, 1898, MITCHELL, SABINE PARISH, LA1,1.

9.HENRI E.3 SHERWOOD (ISSAC D.2, JOHN1)1,1 WAS BORN FEBRUARY 16, 1862 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1, AND DIED AUGUST 25, 1896 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1.SHE MARRIED J. M. CARTER1,1 MAY 11, 1879 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1, SON OF P. CARTER AND M. SMITH.HE WAS BORN WFT EST. 1848-1867 IN GEORGIA1,1, AND DIED WFT EST. 1894-1952 IN HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1.

CHILDREN OF HENRI SHERWOOD AND J. CARTER ARE:

I. JOHN HOWELL4 CARTER1,1, B. JANUARY 15, 1891, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1; D. DECEMBER 07, 1934, HARRISONBURG, CATAHOULA PARISH, LA1,1.

II. P. H. CARTER1,1, B. WFT EST. 1880-18961,1; D. WFT EST. 1885-19801,1.

III. J. M. (FILS) CARTER1,1, B. WFT EST. 1880-18961,1; D. WFT EST. 1885-19801,1.

IV. CAMMIE CARTER1,1, B. WFT EST. 1880-18961,1; D. WFT EST. 1885-19831,1.

GENERATION NO. 4

10.WILLIAM D.4 SHERWOOD (KING D.3, SAMUEL H.2, JOHN1) WAS BORN JANUARY 06, 1874, AND DIED APRIL 13, 1946.HE MARRIED MARY IDA HAND JANUARY 06, 1901, DAUGHTER OF JAMES HAND AND MARY BIDDLE.SHE WAS BORN FEBRUARY 24, 1880, AND DIED SEPTEMBER 06, 1962.

NOTES FOR WILLIAM D. SHERWOOD:

POSSIBLY OF ALONZO.WAS A BAPTIST PREACHER.LAST COUPLE HE MARRIED WAS ROBERT AND JANICE GUIN.ROBERT HAS A PEN WITH W.D. SHERWOOD'S NAME ON IT.GAVE IT TO THE COUPLE AT THE WEDDING CEREMONY.

MARRIAGE DATE MAY BE 1900 BUT SHOWN AS 1901 IN FAMILY TREE MARRIAGE INDEX: LA 1718-1925,WINN PARISH RECORDS.

MORE ABOUT WILLIAM D. SHERWOOD:

BURIAL: NEW JERUSALEM, WINNFIELD, LA

NOTES FOR MARY IDA HAND:

REFERRED TO AS POLLY HAND IN OBITUARY IN WINN PARISH ENTERPRISE NEWS-AMERICAN, SEPTEMBER 13, 1962.FUNERAL SERVICES WERE CONDUCTED AT 2 P.M. ON FRIDAY AT SOUTHERN FUNERAL HOME CHAPEL WITH DR. W.L. HOLCOMB, PASTOR OF THE FIRST BAPTIST CHURCH, WINNFIELD AND THE REV. MR. SKINNER, PASTOR OF POLLOCK.

PALLBEARERS WERE OLIVER DEAN, SHERWOOD DEAN, JACK HYDE, DOUGLAS SHERWOOD, ALLEN SHERWOOD AND DON CARROLL SHERWOOD.

MORE ABOUT MARY IDA HAND:

BURIAL: NEW JERUSALEM, WINNFIELD, LA

CHILDREN OF WILLIAM SHERWOOD AND MARY HAND ARE:

I. BOY5 SHERWOOD, B. DECEMBER 31, 1900; D. DECEMBER 31, 1900.

21. II. CLYDE EVERGIL SHERWOOD, B. NOVEMBER 01, 1902, WINNFIELD, LA; D. DECEMBER 23, 1989.

III. ELMO SHERWOOD, B. DECEMBER 07, 1904; D. DECEMBER 11, 1975, GARDEN OF MEMORIES, METERIE, LA; M. BONNIE PREVOST.

22. IV. IMOJEAN SHERWOOD, B. DECEMBER 07, 1904; D. JANUARY 05, 1988, ST. FRANCIS CABRINI HOSPITAL, ALEXANDRIA< LA.

V. BOY SHERWOOD, B. JANUARY 01, 1906; D. JANUARY 06, 1906.

MORE ABOUT BOY SHERWOOD:

BURIAL: NEW JERUSALEM CEMETERY, WINN PARISH, LA

FACT 1 (2): STILL BORN

23. VI. IDA MARIE SHERWOOD, B. DECEMBER 29, 1907; D. APRIL 30, 1981.

VII. LANNIS SHERWOOD, B. DECEMBER 23, 1909; D. JULY 14, 1965, WINNFIELD, WINN PARISH, LOUISIANA.

MORE ABOUT LANNIS SHERWOOD:

BURIAL: NEW JERESULEM CEMETERY, WINNFIELD, LA

IX. AYLON SHERWOOD, B. AUGUST 07, 1914; M. HELLEN.

25. X. RUBY MAE SHERWOOD, B. MAY 01, 1916; D. DECEMBER 24, 1962, ALBUQUERQUE, NEW MEXICO.

CHILDREN OF ELLA SHERWOOD AND ROBERT PRICE ARE:

27. II. VERDIE LEE PRICE, B. FEBRUARY 16, 1896, UNION SPRINGS, SABINE PARISH, LA; D. MARCH 14, 1979, DELHI, RICHLAND PARISH, LA.
